snippet: A group of about 180 Marines arrived on Tuesday night as part of President Obama’s publicly stated strategy of shifting the American military’s long-term focus toward the Pacific and an increasingly assertive China.
abstract: About 180 Marines arrive in Australia as part of Pres Obama’s publicly stated strategy of shifting the American military’s long-term focus toward the Pacific and an increasingly assertive China; they will engage in training exercises with the Australian Defense Force during their six-month rotation.
lead_paragraph: A group of about 180 Marines arrived on Tuesday night as part of President Obama’s publicly stated strategy of shifting the American military’s long-term focus toward the Pacific and an increasingly assertive China.

headline.seo: As Part of New Pact, U.S. Marines Arrive in Australia
headline.main: As Part of Pact, U.S. Marines Arrive in Australia, in China’s Strategic Backyard
headline.print_headline: As Part of Pact, U.S. Marines Arrive in Australia, in China’s Strategic Backyard

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
